laws.name: Indian Penal Code (IPC)
laws.description: Covers various offenses against women including rape, acid attacks, assault, and harassment.

sections.description: Assault or criminal force to woman with intent to outrage her modesty
Sexual harassment including unwelcome advances, sexual favors, or pornography
Assault with intent to disrobe
Voyeurism - capturing or distributing private images of a woman
Stalking (both online and offline)
Insulting the modesty of a woman through word, gesture, or act
Rape and punishment based on severity of the crime
Cruelty by husband or relatives
Acid attacks

laws.name: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act
laws.description: Provides protection to women against various forms of domestic violence.

sections.description: Covers physical, emotional, sexual, economic, or verbal abuse
Government-appointed officers to assist women with legal and support services
Ensures woman's right to reside in shared household

laws.name: Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace Act
laws.description: Protects women from sexual harassment at workplace and mandates grievance mechanisms.

sections.description: Committee to address harassment complaints in workplaces with 10+ employees
District-level committee for small workplaces or in cases against an employer

laws.name: Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act
laws.description: Protects children from sexual assault, harassment, and pornography.

sections.description: Requires anyone aware of abuse to report it
Designated courts to ensure child-friendly and speedy trials

laws.name: Indecent Representation of Women (Prohibition) Act
laws.description: Prevents degrading portrayal of women in media and advertisements.

sections.description: Prohibits depiction of women that is degrading or likely to corrupt public morals

laws.name: Dowry Prohibition Act
laws.description: Prohibits the giving and taking of dowry and addresses harassment or deaths related to dowry.

sections.description: Punishment for suspicious deaths due to dowry within 7 years of marriage

laws.name: Maternity Benefit Act
laws.description: Provides maternity leave, medical benefits, and workplace protections for women.

sections.description: 26 weeks of paid leave for childbirth
Mandatory for companies with 50+ employees

laws.name: National Commission for Women Act
laws.description: Establishes the National Commission for Women to monitor women's rights and suggest reforms.

sections.description: Investigates complaints and inspects places where women are lodged

laws.name: Equal Remuneration Act
laws.description: Mandates equal pay for equal work and non-discrimination in employment for women.

sections.description: Equal pay and non-discrimination in hiring, promotions, and training

laws.name: Muslim Women (Protection of Rights on Marriage) Act
laws.description: Outlaws the practice of instant triple talaq and provides legal protection to Muslim women.

sections.description: Declares instant triple talaq as illegal and void
